translations: n.[外科] 修复学，修补学；弥补术

phrs.translation: 修复学, 假肢, 修复术
修复术和矫形学, 假肢与矫形器, 假肢和矫形器, 修复和矫形外科学
神经修复学, 神经修复术, 神经修复
颌面修复学, 颌面赝复学

sentences.sentence: They have so much more access to information and to learn about what prosthetics are out there.
sentences.translation: 他们有更加多的信息来源，让他们了解什么是义肢。

sentences.sentence: This adorable calf named Meadow is believed to be the first calf ever fitted with double prosthetics.
sentences.translation: 这只可爱的小牛犊名叫美登高，它被认为是第一头装了两只假肢的牛犊。

sentences.sentence: His prosthetics have no knee joints so he had to run with stiff upper legs - a much more physically taxing style.
sentences.translation: 他的义肢没有膝关节，所以他只能依靠略显僵直的大腿来跑步，而用这种方式要比普通人跑起步来费力得多。
